resources.string:
Blue Laundry is a digital company based in 
 Indonesia. Formed by young entrepreneurs 
 and professionals, we thrive to bring a new 
 way of doing laundry business by creating a 
 marketplace and on demand service.

Location: Jl MH Thamrin Kav 28-30 
 Plaza Indonesia 

 Phone: 021 39838236 

 Email: Blue_Laundry@gmail.com 


 If you have any questions, comments, 
 or feedbacks, you can contact us from 
 phone or email on top
